pyqgis_plugin.name: Portugal datum transformations
pyqgis_plugin.description: Easy datum transformation from obsolete mainland Portugal CRSs (Datum 73, Datum Lisboa and ED50) to the new official CRS (ETRS89-PTTM06) using NTv2 datum transformation grids
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Alexander Bruy, Pedro Ven√¢ncio, Giovanni Manghi
